ShoppingList.title: Shopping List
ShoppingList.emptyHint: Add items using the field above
ShoppingList.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"?

History.title: Shopping History
History.description: View completed shopping trips and statistics
History.clearMessage: All shopping records will be deleted.

Tutorial.step1Desc: Type the item name and tap the + button to add it to your list.
Tutorial.step2Desc: Grab the item on its LEFT half and swipe left. A red background with a trash icon will appear.
Tutorial.step3Desc: Grab the item on its RIGHT half and swipe right. The quantity will increase by 1.
Tutorial.step4Desc: Grab the item on its RIGHT half and swipe left. The quantity will decrease by 1.
Tutorial.step5Desc: Tap items to mark them for shopping, then tap the green button to start.
Tutorial.step6Desc: During shopping, tap each item to mark it as bought.
Tutorial.step7Desc: When done, tap Finish Shopping. The session will be saved to history.
Tutorial.step8Desc: View past shopping trips and statistics in Settings > History.
